data.message: System Integrity Audit - Thread Pool Zombie Fix: Applied Windows-safe fix to duro_mcp_server.py: split executors (fast 8-worker + heavy 2-worker), heavy semaphore prevents dogpiling, quarantine rotation on timeout with 10s cooldown, executor captured inside semaphore to prevent race. HEAVY_TOOLS limited to batch ops only (reembed, apply_decay, compress_logs, reindex). User-facing tools like semantic_search stay on fast pool.
data.task: System Integrity Audit - Thread Pool Zombie Fix
data.outcome: Applied Windows-safe fix to duro_mcp_server.py: split executors (fast 8-worker + heavy 2-worker), heavy semaphore prevents dogpiling, quarantine rotation on timeout with 10s cooldown, executor captured inside semaphore to prevent race. HEAVY_TOOLS limited to batch ops only (reembed, apply_decay, compress_logs, reindex). User-facing tools like semantic_search stay on fast pool.
